duties_responsibilities.duty: Enter prescription information, process new and refill prescriptions, and handle insurance billing and documentation.
Retrieve and manage medication inventory, including restocking shelves and preparing for physical inventory.
Administer Rite Aid programs such as FlavoRx and Living More.
Maintain a clean and organized Pharmacy department and assist with paperwork related to filling prescriptions.
Work flexible shifts including weekdays, weekends, evenings, and some holidays to provide patient care.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or General Education Degree (GED)
